comments: A great advisor who is encouraging and makes everything clear. He helped me develop my research a lot.
Appears nice but quite conservative in his approach to politics.

Not horribly interesting but his accent makes up for any boringness. He is very helpful outside of the classroom and very clear with his instructions. It is easy to get an A with him if you keep up your readings and work. Definitely a great prof that I\'d love to have again.
